name: Board Game Mish Mash
description:
This game features Sliding puzzles, Tic-Tac-Toe, generic board game movement, Chess, and Connect 4 all thrown into one. The goal in each level is to win. You can win by satisfying any of the win conditions.

Controls:

  • LMB - Select
  • ESC - Cancel
  • R - Restart
  • Z - Undo

Note: If Win and Lose happen at once, Lose wins, and Win loses.

V1.0 - December 6, 2021 - This was submitted as a final project for Intro to Game Programming. I had planned to implement Sorry! into this as well, but Sorry has about as many rules as all the rest of the games put together. Might come back to add it later, as I had some cool puzzles in mind with it, and it would make the number pieces more useful. Probably won't, though, since I think the next game I would make like this would be Proper Chess, which itself will probably be on the shelf for a few years until I'm better at programming architecture.

V1.1 - December 6 2021 - Small update to make the earlier levels clearer thanks to my friends' feedback.
